New Records: Jasprit Bumrah maintained his rhythm and pace in his comeback match, taking two wickets and bowling at an average speed of 137kph.
Key Match Events: Bumrah's impressive bowling performance led to two quick wickets; the match was halted due to rain, resulting in a DLS win for India; Bumrah wrapped up the match with a searing yorker in the last over.
Pre-Game Insights: Bumrah was anticipated to test himself in a competitive setting, and his initial balls showed both promise and pressure as he settled into the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Bumrah was awarded the Player of the Match award, and the win was celebrated as a significant moment in India's cricket journey, especially with Bumrah's return.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bumrah received raucous cheers for every ball and showed signs of his destructive zone, despite not reaching his peak performance.
